title: Patriots offense in shambles? Preseason watch list; Washington WR Jahan Dotson; Blind Take Test
itunes:title: Patriots offense in shambles? Preseason watch list; Washington WR Jahan Dotson; Blind Take Test
description:
The Good Morning Football Podcast begins looking at how concerned the New England Patriots should be after early reports indicate the offense hasn’t looked sharp in training camp. Hosts Jamie Erdahl, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager, and Super Bowl Champion Jason McCourty react to the reports coming out of Patriots training camp. Then they’re joined by Washington Commanders WR Jahan Dotson and he shares how it’s been adapting to the pro game and he also explains why he’s a big fan of Carson Wentz. Later, the GMFB crew plays a hilarious game of “blind take test” where Kyle has to defend why the Lions will be this years Bengals and Jason has to defend why a plane seat mate is the best way to make a new friend. The podcast finishes up with Peter’s preseason watch list

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
